name: HyperVelocity: Planetary Grand Prix
description:
Tired of piddling around at subsonic speeds? Wish you had more split-screen games to play with your friends? Then this is the game for you!

Inspired by classic high-speed racing games, HyperVelocity: Planetary Grand Prix lets you compete against your friends in a skill-intensive test of speed and reaction times. Tear across the race track at over mach 3! Race against your friends using 8 unique Null-G Rocket Racers! Compete for the best time across 6 different tracks! Power up your engines and prepare to blast off in this rocket-fueled race to the finish!

HyperVelocity: Planetary Grand Prix is currently in development, and as such all included features are subject to change.
